content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
────────────────────────────
### Central Production Hub at position(0.5, 0.5)
Consists of:
- Wooden chest at position(0.5, 0.5) serving as the central resource storage.
- Stone furnace at position(1.0, -1.0) used for smelting iron ore.
- Stone furnace at position(3.0, 1.0) used for smelting copper ore.

### Research Lab at position(6.5, 6.5)
Consists of:
- Lab at position(6.5, 6.5) with lab input {'automation-science-pack': 10}, status NO_POWER, research automation, electrical_id 20724.
- ElectricityGroup (id = 20724) connecting small electric poles at positions (8.5, 6.5), (9.5, 6.5) and (10.5, 7.5) with voltage 0.

### Steam-Powered Electricity Generator at position(-10.5, 18.5)
Consists of:
- Generator (steam engine) at position(-10.5, 18.5) with warnings [not connected to power network, no input liquid, no fluid present in connections] and connection points [(-10.5, 16.0), (-10.5, 21.0)].
- Boiler at position(-6.0, 24.5) used for heating water; status NO_FUEL; warnings [out of fuel]; holding approximately 190 water units; connection points [(-5.5, 22.5), (-5.5, 26.5)]; utilizing fluid_system [91843] with steam output point (-7.5, 24.5).
- Offshore Pump at position(-9.5, 24.5) used for water intake; status WORKING; holding about 99.24 water units; utilizing fluid_system [91843].
- Wooden chest at position(-4.5, 25.5) serving as the manual fuel feeding system.
- Pipeline Network consisting of:
   • PipeGroup at position(-5.5, 19.5) with fluid_system 91843, status WORKING.
   • PipeGroup at position(-2.5, 19.5) with fluid_system 91842, status EMPTY.
   • PipeGroup at position(5.5, 21.5) with fluid_system 91855, status EMPTY.
   • PipeGroup at position(1.5, 23.5) with fluid_system 91854, status EMPTY.
   • PipeGroup at position(-7.5, 25.5) with fluid_system 91850, status EMPTY.
   • PipeGroup at position(0.5, 24.5) with fluid_system 91859, status EMPTY.
   • PipeGroup at position(1.5, 25.5) with fluid_system 91858, status EMPTY.
   • PipeGroup at position(1.5, 27.5) with fluid_system 91861, status EMPTY.
   • PipeGroup at position(4.5, 27.5) with fluid_system 91862, status EMPTY.
   • PipeGroup at position(-0.5, 28.5) with fluid_system 91863, status EMPTY.

ERROR TIPS
────────────────────────────
- Candidate PipeGroup Connection Failures:
  • Repeated connection attempts using candidate pipe groups with fluid_system values 91179, 91263, 91345, 91429, 91511, 91595, 91677, and 91761 near Position(-5.5, 19.5) returned 0 candidates.
  • Remediation: Update the candidate fluid_system values to match the current pipeline network identifiers [91843, 91842, 91855, 91854, 91850, 91859, 91858, 91861, 91862, 91863] and adjust connection parameters accordingly.

- Search Radius and Entity Positioning:
  • Consistent failures to locate candidate pipe groups suggest a too-restrictive search radius or misaligned entity positions.
  • Remediation: Broaden the search radius and verify that entity placements align correctly with the network layout.

- Inventory Parameter Consistency:
  • Ensure standardized inventory parameter usage to prevent mismatches during operations.
